title: Mobile-Based Information Literacy Training Design for Academic Librarians

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Information Retrieval Skills and Experience Using Library Systems
context.additional_context: Mobile-friendly design for learners over 40, requiring short-term intensive sessions

learning_goals: Learners can effectively search for and evaluate credible resources in academic databases
Learners can develop learning objectives and assessment tools for one-time educational sessions by applying the backward design model
Learners will be equipped with the competency to design and operate information literacy education content in mobile environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
